properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the certificate for.

properties.name: orchestration
properties.description: (Optional) Must be one of cattle, swarm, mesos, windows or kubernetes. This is a helper for setting the project_template_ids for the included Rancher templates. This will conflict with project_template_id setting. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

properties.name: project_template_id
properties.description: (Optional) This can be any valid project template ID. If this is set, then orchestration can not be. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

properties.name: member
properties.description: (Optional) Members to add to the environment.

properties.name: member-parameters-reference
properties.description: » Member Parameters Reference

properties.name: external_id
properties.description: (Required) The external ID of the member.

properties.name: external_id_type
properties.description: (Required) The external ID type of the member.

properties.name: role
properties.description: (Required) The role of the member in the environment.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment the host is associated to.

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: (Required) The host name. Used as the primary key to detect the host ID.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional) A dictionary of labels to apply to the host. Computed internal labels are excluded from that list.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the registration token.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the token for.

properties.name: host_labels
properties.description: (Optional) A map of host labels to add to the registration command.

properties.name: agent_ip
properties.description: (Optional) A string containing the CATTLE_AGENT_IP to add to the registration command.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the registry credential.

properties.name: registry_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the registry to create the credential for.

properties.name: public_value
properties.description: (Required) The public value (user name) of the account.

properties.name: secret_value
properties.description: (Required) The secret value (password) of the account.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the registry for.

properties.name: server_address
properties.description: (Required) The server address for the registry.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the secret for.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the stack for.

properties.name: docker_compose
properties.description: (Optional) The docker-compose.yml content to apply for the stack.

properties.name: rancher_compose
properties.description: (Optional) The rancher-compose.yml content to apply for the stack.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: (Optional) The environment to apply to interpret the docker-compose and rancher-compose files.

properties.name: catalog_id
properties.description: (Optional) The catalog ID to link this stack to. When provided, docker_compose and rancher_compose will be retrieved from the catalog unless they are overridden.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: (Optional) The scope to attach the stack to. Must be one of user or system. Defaults to user.

properties.name: start_on_create
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to start the stack automatically.

properties.name: finish_upgrade
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to automatically finish upgrades to this stack.

properties.name: environment_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the environment to create the volume for.
